title: Preview: Burial – Truant/Rough Sleeper
body:
[**Burial**’s](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6108-review-burial-street-halo-ep/ "Review: Burial – Street Halo 12″") new single, out December 17 on **Hyperdub**, has finally been titled ‘_Truant’_ b/w ‘_Rough Sleeper_’. The preview has been floating around the Internet all day, the anticipation brimming after the release of the _Kindred EP_ release earlier this year. The preview is only a minute long, but as with any **[Burial](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/15467-new-burial-four-tet-nova/ "New: Burial & Four Tet – Nova")** release, it’s classic **Burial** with a whole load of new ideas/sounds thrown into the mix that, as always, make the ears salivate.

Stream the preview below.
